articles.title: Kim Jong Un Issues Order for Test-fire of Inter-continental Ballistic Rocket Hwasong-14
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Issues Order for Test-fire of Inter-continental Ballistic Rocket Hwasong-14
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un signed the order to carry out the test-fire of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 on July 3, Juche 106 (2017).
					 There will be a report of the DPRK Academy of Defence Science on the successful launch of Hwasong-14 that was conducted under the personal guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Report of DPRK Academy of Defence Science
articles.content:
Report of DPRK Academy of Defence Science
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Defence Science of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea released the following report Tuesday:
					 Scientists and technicians of the DPRK Academy of Defence Science successfully carried out the test-fire of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14, newly researched and developed by them under the strategic decision of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The rocket blasted off from the northwestern part of the DPRK at 9:00, July 4, Juche 106 (2017) to make 39 minute flight along its pre-set trajectory before accurately hitting the target waters in the open sea in the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 The test-launch was carried out at the maximum angle launch system and had no adverse effect on the security of neighboring countries.
					
					 The rocket was boosted to the maximum height of 2, 802km and traveled 933km distance.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of our party, state and the army, personally observed the process of the test-launch in field and solemnly declared before the world its shining success.
					
					 The success in the test-fire of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14, final gate to rounding off the state nuclear force, at just one go is a powerful manifestation of the invincible state might and the tremendous capability of the self-reliant national defence industry of Juche Korea that has advanced at a remarkably rapid pace under the great Workers' Party of Korea's new line on the simultaneous development of the two fronts, and a great auspicious event to be specially recorded in the history of the DPRK which has long craved for powerful defence capabilities.
					
					 As a full-fledged nuclear power that has been possessed of the most powerful inter-continental ballistic rocket capable of hitting any part of the world, along with nuclear weapons, the DPRK will fundamentally put an end to the U.S. nuclear war threat and blackmail and reliably defend the peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and the region.

articles.title: DPRK Permanent Representative's Letter to UN Secretary General
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Representative's Letter to UN Secretary General
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Ja Song Nam, permanent representative of the DPRK to the United Nations, Monday sent the following letter to Antonio Manuel de Oliveira Guterres, secretary general of the UN:
					 I would like to send this letter to you with regard to the recent incident in which the diplomatic package of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) Permanent Mission to the United Nations was taken away in New York, U.S.
					
					 On 16th of June over 20 agents of the Department of Homeland Security (according to their introduction) and policemen committed a criminal act of moving in on the diplomats of the DPRK who were en route home after attending the tenth session of the Conference of States Parties to the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities at the United Nations Headquarters in New York and took away the diplomatic package from them. 
					
					 The extortion of the diplomatic package made by the U.S. is an unpardonable act of infringement on the sovereignty of DPRK as a member state of the United Nations and a criminal offence of grave violation of the international law.
					
					 Inviolability and protection of the diplomatic bag is clearly stipulated in the Article 27 of the Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations.
					
					 Department of State of the U.S. made official apology for the incident but still delays the return of the diplomatic package. 
					
					 All these actions show the extreme insolence and impudence of the U.S. which acts rudely in total disregard to the international law, out of inveterate refusal of the DPRK.
					
					 The extortion of the diplomatic package of a sovereign state in the heart of New York where the UN Headquarters is located and international conferences including the UN General Assembly are held clearly proves that the U.S. is an unlawful and lawless rogue state.
					
					 As UN has the Committee on Relations with the Host Country in its system to deal with the issues of the security of the missions accredited to it, it should strongly call into the question in due course the issue of imprudent act of the U.S. against the DPRK delegation.
					
					 We look forward to your active cooperation in taking practical measures by UN to settle this incident which constitutes an act of infringement on the sovereignty of a UN member state.

articles.title: Greetings to Regular National Congress of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Greetings to Regular National Congress of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Tuesday sent a message of greeting to the 6th Regular National Congress of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Party. 
					The message extended warm and friendly greetings to the National Council of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and all its party members.
					
					It expressed belief that the regular national congress would serve as an important occasion in consolidating the successes made in the struggle for the country's independent development and prosperity and in making the party grow stronger.
					
					It expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the WPK and the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea would grow stronger in the idea of independence, peace and friendship in the future, too, and wished the congress great success in its work.

articles.title: Talks between DPRK, Russian Youth League Chiefs
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK, Russian Youth League Chiefs
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, and Vladimir Isakov, first secretary of the C.C., Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation who is secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Russian Federation, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their organizations' activities and exchanged their views on further boosting the friendship between the two organizations.
					
					 On the same day, the Central Committee of the Youth League of the DPRK hosted a reception for the delegation of the Russian youth organization.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Party Leader of Moldova
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Party Leader of Moldova
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Grechany, chairman of the Party of Socialists in the Republic of Moldova.
					 The gift was conveyed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), by Grigore Novac, vice-chairman of the National Council of the Party of Socialists in the Republic of Moldova, on Monday.
					
					 Ri was heading a delegation of the WPK to participate in the celebrations of the 20th anniversary of the founding of the Party of Socialists in the Republic of Moldova.

articles.title: Ceremony of Naming Fidel Castro Ruz Classroom Held
articles.content:
Ceremony of Naming Fidel Castro Ruz Classroom Held
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of naming a classroom after Fidel Castro Ruz was held at Pyongyang Foreign Languages School under Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies on Tuesday to mark the 91 birth anniversary of Fidel Castro Ruz and with the approach of the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.
					 It was attended by So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, officials concerned, teachers and pupils of the school, Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speakers noted at the ceremony that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il together with Fidel Castro Ruz established and boosted the ties of friendship between the two countries.
					
					 They expressed their will to make every possible effort to value and invariably develop the good comradely relations provided by the preceding leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Here
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of activists of the Japan-Korea friendship led by Akihiro Harada, co-representative of the Solidarity of Broad Sections of People for Independence, Peace and Democracy in Japan, arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of its Central Committee, returned home on Tuesday after attending the celebrations of the 20th anniversary of the foundation of the Party of Socialists in the Republic of Moldova.

articles.title: DFRK Calls for Implementing Three Principles of National Reunification
articles.content:
DFRK Calls for Implementing Three Principles of National Reunification
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) issued a statement Tuesday, the 45th anniversary of the July 4 joint statement.
					 Thanks to President Kim Il Sung's patriotic decision and wise guidance, high-level political talks were held between the north and the south of Korea in 1972, for the first time in history of their division, at which the three principles of Korea's reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and the great national unity were declared
					
					 The birth of the July 4 joint statement provided the Korean nation with the most correct guidelines for carrying out the cause of independent reunification, and enabled nationwide reunification movement to dynamically advance along the coordinates of victory, while foiling all sorts of obstructive moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad, the statement says, and goes on:
					
					 Whoever is concerned about the future of the nation and wishes for the new future of a reunified country should not remain an on-looker to the situation of the north-south relations that have faced the worst catastrophe and tension but more courageously turn out under the immutable banner of the three principles of national reunification.
					
					 The DFRK Central Committee clarifies the following stand, reflecting the ardent desire of all Koreans for the improved north-south relations and the country's reunification, out of its heavy responsibility for the destiny of the nation:
					
					 1. The forces submitting and kowtowing to the U.S. while going against the nation's aspiration and desire for the earliest reunification of the country under the uplifted banner of national independence should be wiped out of this sacred land.
					
					 The deplorable situation, in which outsiders lord it over half of the land of the country and inflict all sorts of disaster and sacrifice on the Korean nation although more than 70 years have passed since the division of its territory at the hands of outsiders against the nation's will, eloquently proves that the road of independence is the only way out for the reunification and the national prosperity.
					
					 That's why we Koreans, never tolerated the traitors who sacrifice the nation's dignity and interests in pursuance of outsiders, being subservient to the U.S., but dealt heavy blows on them.
					
					 The present south Korean chief executive who is leaving the records of submission to the U.S., while abusing the power granted to him by the candlelight demonstrators, being oblivious of this lesson of history, should clearly understand that he can never be exceptional.
					
					 What dialogues can be exchanged and how will it be possible to hold hands for the solution of the reunification issue with those who are so much worried about courting displeasure of his master and who take every careful step even on their own land so that their steps would not fall out of their master's steps.
					
					 No matter how many times the regimes in south Korea are replaced and whoever holds power, nothing can be expected and can change unless the policy of dependence on foreign forces is replaced by the policy of giving priority to the nation and the old concept of submission and flunkeyism toward the U.S. is replaced by the idea of prioritizing the nation. This is a serious lesson we have drawn once again.
					
					 2. We have to deal heavy blows at the warmongers inside and outside who are bringing escalated tension and crisis of a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula through reckless military actions, in defiance of the fundamental principle of peaceful reunification.
					
					 The puppet warmongers, who turned south Korea into the biggest powder arsenal in the Far East and an advance base of a nuclear war for threatening and blackmailing the fellow countrymen with nukes, in defiance of the nation's cherished desire for peaceful reunification, are making desperate efforts to shift the responsibility for the escalated tension on to the DPRK side, faulting its measures for bolstering the capabilities for self-defence whenever opportunity presents itself and shelving their own cursed crimes.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not run amuck, clearly understanding what catastrophic consequences will entail in case they are inveigled into the outsiders' attempt for a nuclear war.
					
					 We have got ourselves fully ready including the ability to mount precision strike to target even the eyes of all sorts of enemies, after putting in place the deterrence for showering the U.S. with bullets and shells of justice any moment. Yet, we are making all possible efforts for the peaceful reunification of the country as we do not want to see the land of the nation getting enveloped in the flame of war and the whole nation getting embroiled in the holocaust of a war.
					
					 The starting point for the genuine peace on the Korean peninsula is the aggressor U.S. imperialists' withdrawal from south Korea with all lethal weapons with them, not the DPRK's "nuclear dismantlement", and the first step toward the peaceful reunification is for the south Korean authorities to lay down the arms leveling at the DPRK and responding to the DPRK's measure for defusing military tension. They should pay heed to this advice.
					
					 3. The whole nation should pave a wide avenue to reunification by its concerted efforts after resolutely doing away with the evil practices of confrontation and hostility that block the nationwide trend toward the great national unity.
					
					 Even though differing ideologies and social systems have existed in the north and the south for scores of years, there can not be any reason for them not to get united if they put the national commonness and co-interests above all, and the north and the south can certainly hold hands as companions in the road for reunification.
					
					 The difference between the ideology and social system can not be a reason for the same fellow countrymen to distrust and stand in confrontation and isms and interests of classes and strata can never be an obstacle preventing the nation from achieving unity. This is our principled stand.
					
					 But the south Korean authorities, shunning such good faith and effort shown by the DPRK, hold their hands with outsiders standing against national reconciliation and unity and incite mistrust and stand-off while faulting the north over the nuclear force, tantamount to a treasure common to the nation, and the non-existent "human rights issue". How can the smooth development of the north-south relations be expected?
					
					 The great national unity is a short-cut to reunification.
					
					 Invariable is the will and faith of the DPRK to open up the new horizon of independent reunification in closer unity, however desperate the separatist forces at home and abroad may get.
					
					 We will hold hands with anyone who values the nation and courageously turns out for the solution to the reunification issue, but we will neither compromise nor pardon those who still take to the path of treachery, not away from the old concept of sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The statement stresses that the DPRK will as ever fulfill its noble mission and responsibility in improving the north-south relations and achieving the independent reunification in line with the requirements and interests of the nation, while consistently holding fast to the three principles of national reunification and their embodiments north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: Pomminryon Calls for Ushering in New Heyday for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Pomminryon Calls for Ushering in New Heyday for Korea's Reunification
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a joint resolution on Tuesday, the 45th anniversary of the publication of the historic July 4 joint statement.
					 Noting the publication of the joint statement was an event of great significance in the history of the Korean nation as it opened a new chapter of dialogue and negotiations for the first time in the north-south relations that had been frozen by distrust and confrontation for decades and provided all Koreans with hope and optimism about national reunification, the resolution said:
					
					 The birth of the three principles of national reunification helped the Korean nation dynamically advance the movement for reunification on the track of independence both in name and reality.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the embodiment of the principles, let all Koreans renew their faith that reunification would surely come when they pool their efforts in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Expressing the will to open up a new heyday of national reunification by firmly preserving and thoroughly implementing the three principles of national reunification and the north-south declarations, the resolution said:
					
					 1. Pomminryon will adhere to the principle of independence in the movement for national reunification, the principle of prioritizing and firmly defending the interests of the nation.
					
					 It will as ever invariably uphold independence, regarding it as the lifeline in tackling the reunification issue, the issue of the nation.
					
					 2. Pomminryon will intensify the struggle to defend the lasting peace of the Korean peninsula from the war moves of the outsiders and their followers seeking to plunge the Korean nation into a nuclear disaster.
					
					 It will launch a vigorous pan-national movement for peace against war to resolutely foil the war provocation moves of the gangster-like U.S. which attempts to reduce the Korean peninsula into a theater of nuclear war, indifferent to the destiny of the Korean nation.
					
					 It will intensify the mass struggle for driving the U.S. troops out of south Korea and getting all nuclear war equipment for aggression withdrawn from it.
					
					 3. Pomminryon will wage a brisk campaign for realizing the solidarity and unity of Koreans of various circles in the north and the south and abroad under the uplifted banner of great national unity.
					
					 If all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad get firmly united, irrespective of ideology and ism, political view and religious belief, social system and region, that precisely means national reunification.
					
					 Pomminryon will achieve solidarity and unity with all political parties and organizations respecting the three principles of national reunification and the north-south declarations and open the gate to reunification together with them by placing national reunification, the great cause of all Koreans, above all.

articles.title: Joint Conference of Social Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint Conference of Social Organizations Held
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A joint conference of social organizations took place here Tuesday, the 45th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement. 
					 Attending it were officials and members of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, the National Peace Committee of Korea, the Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea and the Korean Committee for Afro-Asian Solidarity.
					
					 Present as observers were representatives and staff members of foreign embassies here and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, in her report said that the publication of the July 4 joint statement main contents of which are the three principles of national reunification for independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity was the historic event as it gave all Koreans the great programme for reunification common to the nation. 
					
					 The present reality when the U.S. and its vassal forces' moves to ignite a nuclear war and campaign for sanctions and pressure against the DPRK are getting serious urgently requires holding fast to the three principles of national reunification in the drive for reunification of Korea, the reporter said.
					
					 She called upon the social organizations which took part in the joint conference to fulfill their responsibilities and roles in the work for accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 Speakers at the conference expressed the will to protect and glorify the exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed for national reunification and dynamically struggle for providing international circumstances favorable for Korea's reunification true to the idea and intention of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An appeal to all the progressives of the world was read out at the conference. It said:
					
					 Firstly, let us fully support the just struggle of the Korean people to achieve the reunification of the country on the principle of national independence and great national unity.
					
					 Secondly, let us vigorously launch worldwide activities for ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and strongly demanding the U.S. withdraw its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Thirdly, let us vehemently stage the struggle for denouncing injustice and illegality of the anti-DPRK sanctions and racket of "human rights" by the U.S. and its vassal forces and achieving genuine international justice.
					
					 Fourthly, let us launch international solidarity movement supporting Korea's reunification as more extensive and massive one.
					
					 The appeal expressed the belief that all the progressive people, who aspire after the building of an independent new world and global peace, will extend full support and solidarity to the cause of the Korean people for national reunification in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK People Hail Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-14
articles.content:
DPRK People Hail Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-14
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the report on the successful test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 was televised by the Korean Central TV Broadcasting Service at 15:00 on Tuesday, all the army and people of the country are gripped by a great joy. 
					 Ri Un Chon, vice-minister of Metallurgical Industry, in an interview with KCNA, said:
					
					 The success in the test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 is a manifestation of the invincible might of Juche Korea and tremendous capability of its self-reliant national defence industry that has been rapidly strengthened. It is also a great historical victory in putting an end to the persistent nuclear war threat posed by the U.S. against the DPRK.
					
					 The news about the successful test-fire greatly encourages the army and people in the country who are rushing ahead like a whirlwind toward the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners.
					
					 I am much gratified with just imagining the wretched appearance of the U.S. shocked by the test-fire.
					
					 I extend warm greetings to defence scientists and technicians who developed the intercontinental ballistic rocket, true to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's far-sighted idea for building a nuclear power.
					
					 Kim Ryong, secretary general of the C.C, General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea, said:
					
					 The success in the test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket at the first go-off is a great auspicious event to be specially recorded in national history.
					
					 I feel a great pride of being a citizen of a nuclear giant having the most powerful intercontinental ballistic rocket capable of hitting any target in the world as well as nuclear weapons.
					
					 In the spirit displayed by the defence scientists and technicians in making the intercontinental ballistic rocket with the might of self-reliance and self-development, I will do my best to solve sci-tech problems arising in building an economic power and improving the people's living standard.

articles.title: DPRK People Inflamed with Hatred for Heinous Terrorists
articles.content:
DPRK People Inflamed with Hatred for Heinous Terrorists
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the joint statement issued by the Ministry of State Security, the Ministry of People's Security and the Central Public Prosecutors Office of the DPRK, the people in the country are inflamed with surging indignation against traitors Park Geun Hye and Ri Pyong Ho, ex-Director of the puppet Intelligence Service of south Korea, who dared to hatch and press for the heinous plot to hurt the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 In this regard, Ryu Yong Chol, department director of the Ministry of Public Health, told KCNA:
					
					 It is not long since a group of heinous terrorists, who attempted to commit a state-sponsored terrorism against the supreme leadership of the DPRK with the use of bio-chemical substance, was arrested.
					
					 However, devilish Park Geun Hye and Ri Pyong Ho and their group had pushed the operation of "removing the north's leadership" in secrecy again and even hatched an "assassination" plot against it.
					
					 It is the firm will of all the army and people of the DPRK to find out those criminals, who dared challenge our supreme leadership and attempt to hurt its security, wherever they hide in the world and mercilessly punish them without fail.
					
					 Ji Yong Nam, chairman of the Pobu Co-op Farm in Kaechon City, South Phyongan Province, said:
					
					 Our farmers are unanimous in calling for destroying traitors Park Geun Hye and Ri Pyong Ho and their group.
					
					 Enemies should clearly bean in their minds that it is impossible for them to cloak the sun as long as there are the army and people in the DPRK who have firmly rallied for devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 The heaviest and most horrible penalty awaits them and they will find no place safe from it on the earth.

articles.title: Korean People Enraged at State-sponsored Terrorists
articles.content:
Korean People Enraged at State-sponsored Terrorists
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people in the DPRK are afire with hatred towards the criminals who hatched the heinous state-sponsored terrorism against the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 In this regard, Jong Song Ho, an official of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 It is unpardonable that traitors Park Geun Hye and Ri Pyong Ho, ex-Director of the puppet Intelligence Service, hatched the indelible state-sponsored terrorism against our supreme leadership, the destiny and future of the Korean people.
					
					 Traitors Park Geun Hye and Ri Pyong Ho and their group deserve the heaviest penalty for their heinous crime.
					
					 Our army and people will find out those criminals wherever they hide in the world and put them to death penalty without fail.
					
					 Choe Hong Rak, a researcher of the Law Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, said all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK are unanimous in asserting that the heaviest penalty should be put on those state-sponsored terrorists like Park Geun Hye and Ri Pyong Ho and their group.
					
					 Yun Song Chol, chief engineer of the Sangwon Cement Complex, said:
					
					 I can hardly repress my indignation over the fact that those dirty terrorists dared hatch a heinous plot to hurt our supreme leadership.
					
					 We should find out all those, who attempted the hideous state-sponsored terrorism, wherever they hide in the world and mercilessly punish them in the name of our people.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Gold Medal in Judo Grand Prix, Huhehaote 2017
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Gold Medal in Judo Grand Prix, Huhehaote 2017
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK judoist Rim Jong Sim won a gold medal in the women's 52kg category in the Judo Grand Prix, Huhehaote 2017.
					 Rim defeated her rivals of Hong Kong of China and Hungary in preliminaries, Mongolian rival in the semi-finals and Canadian rival in the finals.
					
					 The championship, held in Huhehaote of China from June 30 to July 2, brought together more than 250 men and women players from 26 countries and regions including the DPRK, Russia, Ukraine and Canada.
					
					 The DPRK players returned home on Tuesday after taking part in the championship.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. Attempt to Ignite Nuclear War in Korea
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. Attempt to Ignite Nuclear War in Korea
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. introduced its Aegis destroyer Mustin more than 200 km into the economic waters of the DPRK side on espionage mission. It simultaneously let two B-1B nuclear strategic bombers in the sky above south Korea to have a drill for preemptive nuclear attack on major targets of the DPRK, together with fighters of the puppet Air Force. And it announced that B-1Bs would fly over the Korean peninsula more than once a month on a regular basis.
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Tuesday terms this an unpardonable anti-DPRK military provocation which showed why the U.S. touted so much about "nuclear and missile threat" from the north. 
					
					 Since the Trump administration emerged, the U.S. strategic scheme to solve the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula by force has reached a serious phase, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The U.S. is mulling igniting a nuclear war on the peninsula at any cost.
					
					 Now that the U.S. has evidently made an option for a war, not for peace and stability, the DPRK can no longer remain a passive onlooker.
					
					 It is the DPRK's traditional mode and the spirit of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army to react to a war with a total war and to the enemies' provocation of a nuclear war with Korean-style powerful preemptive nuclear strike.
					
					 The U.S. should not misjudge the stamina and will of the army and people of the DPRK to decisively and totally conclude the DPRK-U.S. standoff.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lays bare Cynical Ploy Japanese Reactionaries Seek in Touting "Defense"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lays bare Cynical Ploy Japanese Reactionaries Seek in Touting "Defense"
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson in a commentary on Tuesday denounces the Japanese reactionaries for zealously bolstering the military capability aimed at building up the missile defense system.
					 While scheming to deploy THAAD in their territory, the Japanese reactionaries recently deployed Patriot interceptor missiles of the "Self-Defense Forces" from Saitama Prefecture to Asaka base in Tokyo Metropolis. The Japanese Defense Ministry announced that it would stage such mobile exercises at other various military bases in Kumamoto Prefecture, Fukuoka Prefecture and other areas.
					
					 In this regard, the commentary says that their trumpeting about "defense" is nothing but a revelation of their black-hearted intention to justify arms buildup by citing other's threats.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is an inveterate bad habit and trite method peculiar to Japan to fault others for its egoistic aims.
					
					 Emerging a military giant and realizing overseas expansion have always been preoccupation of the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					 If they keep on running amuck to realize daydream, the army and people of the DPRK will vent their pent-up resentment and have towering grudge settled.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules S. Korean Authorities' Burlesques
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules S. Korean Authorities' Burlesques
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities staged what was called a "peace rally" and a "commemoration" with June 25, the day of outbreak of the Korean War, as an occasion to incite the hostility towards the DPRK.
					 Such shameful charades are nothing but poor burlesques to cover up the true colors of those who took a positive part in the war unleashed by the U.S. imperialists and the ugly features of the losers, says Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Tuesday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Such an anti-DPRK farce is not only a foolish action praising the sworn enemy who inflicted the unimaginable war disaster on all the Korean people but also the racket for the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north to confuse right and wrong.
					
					 As already disclosed, the pro-U.S. and confrontation moves by the traitors to the nation during Lee Myung Bak's and Park Geun Hye's tenures were the worst ones.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities are following in the footsteps of the pro-U.S. conservative regimes steeped in sycophancy and submission to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 Sycophancy towards foreign forces and dependence upon them lead to national ruin.
					
					 This is a bitter lesson drawn in the history of the Korean nation and a truth taught by it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better behave themselves, well aware that sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots are never the way out but a miserable destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Inciting Military Confrontation against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Inciting Military Confrontation against DPRK
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers recently staged bombing drills aiming at nuclear facilities of the DPRK in south Korea and the U.S. mainland together with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces. On the occasion of June 25, they hurled huge armed forces into the area of the Military Demarcation Line in south Korean Kangwon Province to conduct "2017 unification drill". The "prime minister" and other heavyweights of south Korea went round the forward area to vociferate about "counteraction to existing threats from the north."
					 The designated defense minister at a "National Assembly" confirmation hearing said he would prepare the south Korean army to combat in the northern area after making the front going up toward the north in contingency. Even the chief executive of south Korea faulted the DPRK and openly incited military confrontation with the north, claiming that "dialogue is possible with the strong defense capability."
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 The reckless provocations of the south Korean authorities are a challenge to the righteous appeal and sincere efforts of the DPRK to defuse the military tension.
					
					 While talking about "dialogue, they are resort to the military provocations to hurt the compatriots in the north. Their behavior is little short of the reckless deed of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors who ran amuck in the north-south confrontation, in collusion with outside forces during the whole tenure of office.
					
					 Dialogue is incompatible with confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clarify their stand on dialogue or confrontation.
					
					 If they truly hope for the north-south dialogue, they should properly understand who their rival is.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities persist in provocations, not bearing in mind our warning and advice, they will be held wholly accountable for all the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: S. Korean Supreme Court Sentences to Prison Terms Those Related to UPP Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Supreme Court Sentences to Prison Terms Those Related to UPP Case
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet supreme court gave nine persons including the chairman of a regional committee of the former Unified Progressive Party (UPP) the verdict of guilty, according to the south Korean MBC on July 2.
					 It imposed prison terms upon Ri Jun Il, chairman of the Jungrang District Committee of the former UPP, for the reason that he organized an "organization benefiting the enemy" and praised the DPRK.
					
					 On the same day, eight others related to the UPP case was sentenced to prison terms.

articles.title: Suppression of Labor Movement Accused in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Labor Movement Accused in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Trade Unions and other labor movement organizations of south Korea held a press conference at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on June 28, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 Speakers there said compensation for damage and provisional attachment system served as typical means for suppression of trade unions in business groups today.
					
					 Since Park Geun Hye took office, in particular, the system has been abused to intensify the second suppression forcing withdrawal from trade unions and dismissal, they stated.

articles.title: Dissolution of "Liberal Korea Party" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Dissolution of "Liberal Korea Party" Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- These days youths and students and other citizens of south Korea stage rallies in Seoul to demand the dissolution of the "Liberal Korea Party", a conservative opposition party, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 At the 13th rally on July 1, speakers branded the LKP as a group which seeks only its interests, showing no care for the life of youths and people.
					
					 They stressed that the LKP, an accomplice in influence peddling in the "state affairs", should be dissolved at once for the future of the people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Benin
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A Benin national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Cotonou on June 20.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and hold a remembrance meeting, a film show and other political and cultural events on the 23rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Thailand
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Thailand
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A Thai committee for remembering HE President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 21.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events including remembrance meeting, seminar and film show to observe the anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Seminars on Exploits of Kim Jong Il Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Exploits of Kim Jong Il Held Abroad
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- There took place seminars on exploits of leader Kim Jong Il in Germany, Britain, Sweden, Bulgaria and Spain between June 15 and 19.
					 They were attended by public figures and masses in those countries.
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea marked an important historic occasion in guaranteeing the successful advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, and other speakers said the strongest Workers' Party of Korea with invincible organizing ability and unity would prosper for all ages as a party deeply rooted among the popular masses, praising Kim Jong Il's party-building exploits.
					
					 Lyudmil Kostadinov, chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and other speakers noted that Kim Jong Il instilled faith in the victory of socialism and courage into the world progressives by publishing "Socialism Is A Science", "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" and other works, firmly defended socialism of the DPRK and wisely steered the cause of global independence against imperialism.
					
					 Chief Miguel Vivanco and members of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Spain praised Kim Jong Il for setting it as the most important task to develop the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung both in name and reality and successfully carrying it into practice in the whole course of his guidance over the party.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at seminars in Sweden and Britain.

articles.title: Foreign Media Criticize U.S. War Crimes
articles.content:
Foreign Media Criticize U.S. War Crimes
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Media of various countries carried articles disclosing and criticizing the crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists during the Korean War between June 21 and 25 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle. 
					 The Russian newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda noted in its article titled "Who actually ignited Korean War":
					
					 The last Korean War was definitely a war of aggression the U.S. ignited by instigating the puppet army of south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. detailed the scenario for provoking the war before discussing and ratifying it at a national security meeting in April 1950.
					
					 On the basis of full preparations the U.S. unleashed the war against the DPRK at dawn of June 25, 1950.
					
					 And it widely spread the story about the DPRK's "attack" on south Korea and urgently dispatched U.S. troops and mercenaries from its 15 satellite countries and even remnants of the imperial Japanese army.
					
					 The U.S. is scheming to cover up its true colors as aggressor and provocateur of the war, but history can neither be written off nor  covered up nor be distorted.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on their websites articles disclosing the truth behind the outbreak of the Korean War under such titles as "How the Korean War broke out".

articles.title: Anti-U.S. Protest in Britain
articles.content:
Anti-U.S. Protest in Britain
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A demonstration was staged outside the U.S. embassy in London to protest against the U.S. imperialists' crimes against humanity and their evermore undisguised hostile policy toward the DPRK on June 24, with the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle as an occasion.
					 Attending it were personages from the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Korean Friendship Association UK, the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula and the New Communist Party of Britain and masses.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula, said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, provoker of the last Korean War, massacred the guiltless Koreans and even used chemical weapons during the war.
					
					 Still now occupying south Korea, they are deploying huge nuclear weapons there and ratcheting up sanctions against the DPRK, posing nuclear threat to it.
					
					 They must roll back their policy hostile to the DPRK and withdraw their troops from south Korea.
					
					 The demonstrators chanted such slogans "Korea is one!" "Yankees go back home!" and "No sanctions, no war!" flying flags of the DPRK and handing over literature to passersby.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ordena lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental Hwasong-14
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ordena lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental Hwasong-14
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dio el 3 de julio del 106 (2017) de la Era Juche la orden firmada de puno y letra sobre la ejecucion del lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental Hwasong-14.
					Se publicara la informacion de la Academia de Ciencias de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre el lanzamiento exitoso de dicho cohete realizado bajo la direccion personal del Maximo Dirigente.

articles.title: Informacion de Academia de Ciencias de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC
articles.content:
Informacion de Academia de Ciencias de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- La Academia de Ciencias de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 4 la siguiente informacion:
					Segun la decision estrategica del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los cientificos y tecnicos de la Academia de Ciencias de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC ejecutaron con exito el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental Hwasong-14, nuevamente desarrollado.
					
					Hwasong-14 fue disparado a las 9 de la manana del 4 de julio de 106 (2017) de la Era Juche en la zona noroeste del pais y ataco exactamente la zona maritima fijada como blanco en alta mar del Mar Este de Corea al cabo de navegar durante 39 minutos siguiendo la orbita prevista.
					
					El lanzamiento de prueba se realizo a manera de aumentar al maximo la altura y no dio ninguna influencia negativa a la seguridad de los paises circunvecinos.
					
					El artefacto alcanzo 2 802km como su maxima altura vertical y navego una distancia de 933km.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente observo en el terreno el proceso de lanzamiento de prueba y declaro con solemnidad a todo el mundo su exito fulminante.
					
					El exito de primer intento del lanzamiento de ensayo de Hwasong-14, puerta final para completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, deviene una manifestacion de la invencible fuerza nacional de la Corea del Juche y del inagotable poderio de su industria de defensa nacional independiente, fortalecidos y desarrollados vertiginosamente bajo la bandera de nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Igualmente, constituye gran evento jubiloso que se registrara con letras mayusculas en la historia de la RPDC que ha venido anhelando de siglo en siglo la poderosa capacidad de defensa nacional.
					
					Como digna potencia nuclear que ademas del arma nuclear, cuenta con el potente cohete balistico intercontinental capaz de atacar cualquier parte del mundo, la RPDC acabara de raiz con la amenaza y chantaje de guerra nuclear de Estados Unidos y defendera fidedignamente la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente del presidente del partido moldavo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente del presidente del partido moldavo
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- Al Mximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un le present un regalo el presidente del Partido de Socialistas de la Repblica de Moldavia, Grechany.
					El vicepresidente del Consejo Nacional de PSRM lo entreg el da 3 a Ri Su Yong, miembro del Bur Poltico y vicepresidente del Comit Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, quien al frente de la delegacin del PTC particip en los festejos por el 20 aniversario de la fundacin de ese partido moldavo.

articles.title: Ja Song Nam envia carta al secretario general de la ONU
articles.content:
Ja Song Nam envia carta al secretario general de la ONU
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- El representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU, Ja Song Nam, envio el dia 3 una carta al secretario general de la ONU, Antonio Manuel de Oliveira Guterres, en relacion con que hace unos dias ocurrio en Nueva York el incidente de arrebato de la valija diplomatica de la representacion permanente coreana ante la ONU.
					La misiva recuerda que el 16 de junio, mas de 20 hombres, incluyendo las figuras pertenecientes al Departamento de Seguridad Nacional y los policias, se lanzaron violentamente contra los diplomaticos coreanos, que estaban en el trayecto de regreso despues de participar en la sesion de la Conferencia de Paises Partidarios del Convenio de Derechos de las Personas con Discapacidades efectuada en Nueva York, y les despojaron la valija diplomatica que se llevaban.
					
					Este incidente deviene el imperdonable atentado a la soberania de la RPDC y un crimen que infringe severamente la ley internacional, denuncia la misiva y continua:
					
					El articulo 27 de la Convencion de Viena sobre las relaciones diplomaticas estipula claramente la inviolabilidad y la proteccion de la valija diplomatica.
					
					Aunque nos pidio oficialmente la disculpa por el caso, el Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. sigue retardando la devolucion de la valija diplomatica arrebatada.
					
					Todo esto demuestra la extremada arrogancia y descaro de EE.UU. que actua groseramente sin hacer caso de la ley internacional partiendo de su acostumbrado veto a la RPDC.
					
					El presente incidente ocurrido en la parte centrica de Nueva York, donde esta situada la sede de la ONU y sirve de lugar de la asamblea general de esta organizacion internacional y otras citas mundiales, deviene una muestra contundente de que EE.UU. es el pais ilegal y gangsteril .
					
					En la ONU existe el comite de relaciones con el pais patrocinador que trata el problema de seguridad de las delegaciones enviadas a la misma.
					
					Por esta razon, la ONU debera cuestionar fuertemente la presente locura de la parte estadounidense contra nuestra delegacion.
					
					Espero la cooperacion activa del secretario general de la ONU en hacer a la ONU tomar medidas practicas para resolver el incidente considerandolo como violacion de la soberania del pais miembro.

articles.title: CC de FDRP publica declaracion por el 45o aniversario de Declaracion del 4 de Julio
articles.content:
CC de FDRP publica declaracion por el 45o aniversario de Declaracion del 4 de Julio
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 45o aniversario de publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, el Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria publico hoy una declaracion.
					Gracias a la patriotica decision y sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, se abrieron en 1972 las conversaciones politicas de alto nivel entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea por primera vez en la historia de division del pais y quedaron declarados solemnemente al interior y exterior del pais los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, o sea, la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional, comienza el documento y prosigue:
					
					El nacimiento de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio permitio a la nacion coreana tener la mas correcta guia directriz para cumplir la causa de reunificacion independiente. Y el movimiento pannacional para la misma causa pudo avanzar con pasos firmes por las coordenadas de victoria frustrando las maniobras obstruccionistas de toda indole de los divisionistas internos y externos.
					
					Cualquier persona que este preocupada por el futuro de la nacion y desee el nuevo futuro de la patria reunificada, no debe observar con brazos cruzados la realidad de las relaciones Norte-Sur caidas en la peor coyuntura de ruptura y tension sino levantarse con mas coraje sosteniendo como bandera invariable los principios arriba mencionados.
					
					Asumiendo la importante responsabilidad por el destino de la nacion y recogiendo el deseo de todos los coreanos sobre la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion del pais, el CC del FDRP expone la siguiente posicion:
					
					1. Debemos aniquilar a las fuerzas sumisas a Estados Unidos, que se oponen a la aspiracion y demanda de toda la nacion de lograr cuanto antes la reunificacion de la patria bajo la bandera de independencia nacional, de modo que ellas no puedan sobrevivir ni un momento mas en el sagrado territorio patrio.
					
					A pesar del transcurso de mas de 70 anos desde la separacion artificial del territorio patrio por las fuerzas foraneas, estas ocupan todavia la mitad e imponen todas las calamidades y sacrificios a los coreanos actuando como duenas. Esta realidad deplorable demuestra elocuentemente que el camino de independencia es la unica via de reunificacion y prosperidad nacional.
					
					Por esta razon, la nacion coreana nunca perdono y castigo duro a los traidores vendepatrias que vendieron la dignidad e intereses de la nacion dedicandose al servilismo a las fuerzas extranjeras y a la sumision a EE.UU.
					
					El actual mandatario surcoreano, quien deja primero las huellas de sometimiento a EE.UU. olvidando esa leccion de la historia y abusando del poder que ha ocupado gracias al apoyo de los manifestantes con velas encendidas, debe conocer que el tampoco puede ser una excepcion.  
					
					No habria nada que comunicarse ni se podria trabajar juntos para resolver el problema de reunificacion, aunque se reuna con los que tienen tanto miedo a la perdida de confianza de su patron gringo y andan con sumo cuidado, incluso en territorio propio, para no cometer actos contraproducentes con la idea y la accion de el.
					
					Mientras no se sustituyan la politica de dependencia de las fuerzas foraneas por la de dar primacia a la nacion y el anticuado dogma de servilismo a EE.UU. por la tendencia de dar importancia a la nacion, no hay nada que esperar ni cambiarse aunque se suceda muchas veces el "poder" en el Sur de Corea y sea quien fuera el que lo tome. Esto es la seria leccion que volvemos a aprender hoy dia. 
					
					2. Hay que infligir un golpe demoledor a los belicistas internos y externos que en desafio a los principios fundamentales de reunificacion pacifica, exacerban la tension y crean la crisis de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana con sus aventureras acciones militares.
					
					Sin hacer caso del anhelo de los coreanos sobre la reunificacion pacifica del pais, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos convirtieron el Sur de Corea en el mayor polvorin del Extremo Oriente y en la base avanzada de guerra nuclear que amenaza y chantajea con armas nucleares a la parte connacional.  Haciendo vista gorda de su inaudito crimen, ellos intentan cinicamente atribuir a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la agravacion de tension cuestionando las medidas de incremento de las fuerzas de autodefensa nacional.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben actuar con prudencia al darse cuenta de cuales son las consecuencias destructivas que sufriran en el momento de sumarse al intento de guerra nuclear de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Aunque la RPDC preparo el disuasivo capaz de abrir en cualquier momento el fuego de justicia a la manera de hacer llover bombas en las espaldas de EE.UU. y tiene hasta el poderio de ataque de superprecision contra los enemigos, realiza todos los esfuerzos posibles por la reunificacion pacifica porque no desea que el territorio patrio se envuelva en el nubarron de guerra y toda la nacion sufra las calamidades de esta contienda.
					
					Seria bueno escuchar con seriedad nuestra advertencia de que la paz verdadera de la Peninsula Coreana debe comenzar no por la "cancelacion nuclear" de la RPDC sino por el regreso a casa de las tropas norteamericanas con todos sus armamentos mortiferos y de que el primer paso a la reunificacion pacifica se dara cuando las autoridades surcoreanas bajen el fusil apuntado a la parte connacional y respondan a sus medidas para aliviar la tension militar. 
					
					3. Es necesario eliminar todos los vicios de confrontacion y hostilidad, que bloquean la corriente pannacional hacia la gran unidad nacional, y abrir ancho camino a la reunificacion con las fuerzas unidas de todos los coreanos.
					
					Si bien en el Norte y el Sur de Corea existen diferentes ideas y regimenes durante varios decenios, no hay motivo por el cual ambas partes no puedan unirse si anteponen la comunidad nacional y los intereses comunes y pueden marchar mano a mano como acompanantes de la causa de reunificacion.
					
					La diferencia de ideologias y regimenes no puede ser el motivo de desconfianza y confrontacion fratricidas y las doctrinas e intereses de las clases y estratos tampoco podran ser el obstaculo para la unidad nacional. He aqui nuestra posicion de principios.
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas hacen vista gorda de tal buena fe y esfuerzos de nuestra parte y fomentan la desconfianza y enfrentamiento cuestionando las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la connacional RPDC, patrimonio comun de la nacion, y el inexistente "problema de derechos humanos" en confabulacion con las fuerzas ajenas que estropean la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion. Entonces, ?como se podria esperar el desarrollo normal de las relaciones intercoreanas?
					
					En la gran unidad de toda la nacion hay el atajo a la reunificacion.
					
					Son invariables nuestra voluntad y conviccion de abrir nuevo horizonte de la reunificacion independiente uniendose mas compactamente mientras se tornen mas desesperadas las maniobras de los divisionistas internos y externos.
					
					Estrecharemos con gusto la mano con cualquier hombre que conceda importancia a la nacion y se levante con valentia para resolver el problema de reunificacion del pais. Pero, no nos conciliaremos ni perdonaremos ni en lo minimo a los tipejos que opten por el camino de traicion y vendepatria sin liberarse del anticuado dogma de sumision proyanqui y confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Al igual que en el pasado, la RPDC mantendra invariablemente los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria y las declaraciones adoptadas entre ambas partes coreanas, criaturas de aquellos, y cumplira con su noble mision y responsabilidad en mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas conforme a la demanda e intereses de toda la nacion y alcanzar la reunificacion independiente.

articles.title: APRP exhorta a abrir nueva era de apogeo para la reunificacion de patria
articles.content:
APRP exhorta a abrir nueva era de apogeo para la reunificacion de patria
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- Las Direcciones Nortena, Surena y Ultramarina de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) publicaron el dia 4 una resolucion conjunta dedicada al 45o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio.
					El documento aclara que la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio fue un acontecimiento historico nacional que abrio la nueva pagina de dialogo y negociaciones entre el Norte y el Sur por primera vez en las relaciones entre ambas partes, congeladas durante varias decadas por la desconfianza y confrontacion, e infundio a toda la nacion la esperanza y optimismo de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Gracias a la presentacion de los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, el movimiento de la nacion coreana por la reunificacion pudo marchar con vigor por la orbita de independencia, apunta y prosigue:
					
					La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, criaturas de los Tres Principios, redoblaron la conviccion de la nacion coreana de que la reunificacion de la patria se lograra sin falta cuando todos los compatriotas marchen adelante con las fuerzas unidas.
					
					Declarando que defenderan y cumpliran perfectamente los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria y las Declaraciones Norte-Sur para abrir la nueva era de viraje para la reunificacion de la patria, las Direcciones Nortena, Surena y Ultramarina de la APRP expone la siguiente decision:
					
					1. En el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, la APRP mantendra firmemente el principio de independencia que aprecia y defiende consecuentemente los intereses de la nacion.
					
					Al igual que en el pasado, la APRP tomara invariablemente la independencia como linea de vida en la solucion de los problemas de la nacion y la reunificacion.
					
					2. La APRP librara con mas audacia la lucha por defender la paz duradera de la Peninsula Coreana rechazando los actos belicos de las fuerzas extranjeras y sus satelites que intentan imponer a la nacion coreana los desastres nucleares.
					
					Desplegara vigorosamente en ambito pannacional el movimiento por la paz y contra la guerra con el objetivo de frustrar tajantemente las tentativas de EE.UU. de convertir todo el territorio coreano en un escenario de guerra nuclear sin tomar en consideracion el destino de la nacion coreana.
					
					Dara mas auge a la lucha masiva por expulsar del suelo surcoreano a las tropas norteamericanas y todos los armamentos de guerra nuclear introducidos por las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					3. La APRP intensificara la lucha por la solidaridad y la alianza de diferentes sectores del Norte, el Sur y ultramar levantando a lo mas alto la bandera de gran unidad nacional.
					
					La reunificacion de la patria es precisamente la unidad de todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar por encima de las diferencias de ideas, ideales, criterios politicos, creencias religiosas, regimenes y regiones. 
					
					Sujetando lo todo a la reunificacion de la patria, gran empresa comun de la nacion, la APRP se solidarizara y se unira con todos los partidos politicos y entidades dentro y fuera del pais, que respeten los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria y las Declaraciones Norte-Sur, para trabajar juntos en el cumplimiento de esa causa nacional.
